editors.item:
If you want to edit this document, follow below instruction: 1. Create a new \
(or replace this \
if you are the first editor) and replace the value inside it as defined on instruction #2. 2. Copy and paste structure inside authors -> prime inside your \
.

item.name: char1
item.description: The first character. Default value is space " ".

item.name: char2
item.description: The second character. Default value is "=".

return.description: Returning string contained octapush string art. \Note :\ To make sure the result has properly format, make sure the `char1` and `char2` parameter has equal length.
